verses.name: Esther 5:3
verses.text: Then said the king unto her, What wilt thou, queen Esther? and what is thy request? it shall be even given thee to the half of the kingdom.

verses.name: Esther 5:4
verses.text: And Esther answered, If it seem good unto the king, let the king and Haman come this day unto the banquet that I have prepared for him.

verses.name: Esther 5:5
verses.text: Then the king said, Cause Haman to make haste, that he may do as Esther hath said. So the king and Haman came to the banquet that Esther had prepared.
